title: [Yegharren Plain, Grasslands]
description: A tall acacia rises from the sea of grass beside the path, its branches spreading like a dark canopy and its fragrant blossoms attracting a few buzzing insects even in the night air.  A constant breeze from the east rustles the tips of the tall grass in an endless wave.

A tall acacia rises from the sea of grass beside the path, its spreading branches providing welcome shade and its fragrant blossoms attracting a variety of colorful insects.  A constant breeze from the east rustles the tips of the tall grass in an endless wave.
